ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Druid question
ygData.msgSnippet: My druid killed lots of bears in her younger days (what can I say, I m a rebel).  Never had a bear agro on me since. Nymue ... From: MLockridge01@cs.com Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
My druid killed lots of bears in her younger days (what can I say, I'm a rebel).  Never had a bear agro on me since.
 
Nymue
 
----- Original Message -----
From: MLockridge01@...
Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 10:09 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Druid question
 
It sure is handy not to have those bears and other animals agro on
you. I keep to not killing animals more for that than anything else.
Plus, hq bear pelts are not common drops. Hunt plenty of other stuff,
I suggest.

Barto of Rivervale, Druid 14.


--- In EverQuest@y..., Jim Fullerton <jimbob@f...> wrote:
> kinda what i thought.  i hear they'll aggro on you once you start
attacking them.  i'm not sure how hardcore i am at the
> roleplaying yet, those HQ bear pelts are good loot for a lvl 10 <g>
>
> Su wrote:
>
> > If you are roleplaying it would be bad. If the bears con amiably
to you it
> > isn't great for roleplay purposes to hunt them. There dont' seem
to be any
> > sort of problems in game terms when you kill them. No
punishements (can't
> > think of the right term) for doing it-- unless you get caught by
an npc
> > druid and then you'll get attacked.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > > Hi, all.  I'm relatively new to the list (been reading it for a
month or
> > so, but I've never posted before).
> > >
> > > Here's my question:  My lvl 10 Druid is currently in EC and I
desperately
> > want to start hunting bears, would this be a bad
> > > thing for a Druid to do?
> > >
> > > Hest, lvl 10 Druid on Teris Thule
> > >
